entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
